com.vaadin.addon.charts.model
Class ContainerDataSeries

java.lang.Object
  com.vaadin.addon.charts.model.AbstractConfigurationObject
      com.vaadin.addon.charts.model.AbstractSeries
          com.vaadin.addon.charts.model.ContainerDataSeries
All Implemented Interfaces:
Series, Serializable
public class ContainerDataSeries
extends AbstractSeries

A series that wraps a Vaadin Container. It is mutable only via the wrapped container.

See Also:
